page.title: 07RECREATION
page.content: {SNOWBALL }- Any number of people can play.One person goes in and turns around and says SNOWBALL.When he or she turns back around you have to stop like a statue.If you are caught moving you have to go up and put your arm on the wall.Eventually a chain forms and when there is only one person left they try to tig the chain.When they do they all try to run back without getting touched.{STOP THE BUS}- Any amount of people can play.Take a piece of paper and divide it into five different subjects.Somebody says the alphabet to themselves and then when he or she is told to stop they say the letter that they were at and the players have to try and give a word in each column beginning with the letter. When one person has got all the words they shout {STOP THE BUS! {
